metrics.name: Completeness
metrics.description: Measures how thoroughly the documentation covers all aspects of the method

guidelines.1: Missing most essential information (parameters, return values, purpose)
guidelines.2: Covers basic purpose but missing details on parameters or returns
guidelines.3: Documents all parameters and returns but lacks exception handling or edge cases
guidelines.5: Perfect documentation covering purpose, parameters, returns, exceptions, and edge cases

metrics.name: Clarity
metrics.description: Evaluates how clear and understandable the documentation is

guidelines.3: Mostly clear but with some confusing elements
guidelines.4: Clear and concise with minor improvements possible
guidelines.5: Exceptionally clear, concise, and easy to understand

metrics.name: Code Alignment
metrics.description: Measures how well the documentation aligns with the actual code

guidelines.1: Documentation contradicts or misrepresents the code
guidelines.2: Documentation partially aligns with code but has significant discrepancies
guidelines.3: Documentation mostly aligns with code but has minor discrepancies
guidelines.4: Documentation accurately reflects code with very minor omissions
guidelines.5: Documentation perfectly aligns with code, including edge cases and special conditions
